trans-unit.source: Contains values used as identifiers for <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含用作标识符的值<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> exposes detailed information of the textual contents of objects such as edit controls and documents.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>公开的详细信息的编辑控件和文档等对象的文本内容。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should be written so that they can work in a partial-trust environment.
trans-unit.target: 应编写 UI 自动化提供程序，以便它们可以在部分信任环境中工作。

trans-unit.source: Because UIAutomationClient.dll is not configured for full trust, your provider code should not reference that assembly.
trans-unit.target: 因为 UIAutomationClient.dll 未配置为完全信任，提供程序代码不应引用该程序集。

trans-unit.source: If it does so, the code may run in a full-trust environment but then fail in a partial-trust environment.
trans-unit.target: 如果情况如此，则代码可以在完全信任环境中运行，但无法在部分信任环境中。

trans-unit.source: In particular, do not use fields from classes in UIAutomationClient.dll such as those in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: 特别是，不要使用 UIAutomationClient.dll 中如<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>中的类字段

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the equivalent fields from classes in UIAutomationTypes.dll, such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: 请改用 UIAutomationTypes.dll 中的类，例如<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>的等效字段

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.AnimationStyle"></xref> attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.AnimationStyle"></xref>文本范围的属性。

trans-unit.source: Animations appear on the screen only; the animated text prints, but the animation effect does not.
trans-unit.target: 仅; 屏幕上显示的动画动画的文本打印，但动画效果却没有。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.AnimationStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值属于类型<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.AnimationStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.AnimationStyle>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.AnimationStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.AnimationStyle>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.AnimationStyle>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the [BackgroundColor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/colors_9xiq.asp) attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 标识[BackgroundColor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/colors_9xiq.asp)文本范围的属性。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.

trans-unit.target: 此属性的值属于类型<xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The default value is a `null` reference (`Nothing` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: 默认值是`null`引用 (`Nothing`中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)])。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.CapStyle"></xref>文本范围的属性。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.target: 此属性的值属于类型<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.CapStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.CapStyle>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the Culture (<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>) attribute of a text range down to the sub-language level; for example, French–Switzerland (fr-CH) instead of French (fr).
trans-unit.target: 标识区域性 (<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>) 的文本范围细化到子语言级别的特性; 例如，瑞士法语 (FR-CH) 而不是法语 (fr)。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值属于类型<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] for more detail on the language code format.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)]有关详细信息的语言代码格式。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The default value is the language of the application [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 默认值是应用程序的语言[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There might be cases where the server does not support the language tag or authors cannot use it.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 可能情况下服务器不支持的语言标记或作者无法使用它的位置。

trans-unit.source: In those cases the default applies.
trans-unit.target: 在这些情况下将应用默认值。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the `FontName` attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 标识`FontName`文本范围的属性。

trans-unit.source: Examples include "Arial Black" and "Arial Narrow".
trans-unit.target: 示例包括"Arial 黑色"和"Arial 窄"。

trans-unit.source: Values are non-localized.
trans-unit.target: 值为非本地化。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值属于类型<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default value is an `empty string`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是`empty string`。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the `FontSize` attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 标识`FontSize`文本范围的属性。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值属于类型<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is `zero`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `zero`。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the `FontWeight` attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 标识`FontWeight`文本范围的属性。

trans-unit.source: Refers to the relative stroke, thickness or boldness of a font.
trans-unit.target: 引用的字体的相对笔画粗细。

trans-unit.source: This is modeled after the `lfWeight` field in [GDI LOGFONT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/fontext_1wmq.asp).
trans-unit.target: 这仿效`lfWeight`字段[GDI LOGFONT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/fontext_1wmq.asp)。

trans-unit.source: For consistency, the following values have been adopted from LOGFONT: 0=DontCare, 100=Thin, 200=ExtraLight or UltraLight, 300=Light, 400=Normal or Regular, 500=Medium, 600=SemiBold or DemiBold, 700=Bold, 800=ExtraBold or UltraBold, and 900=Heavy or Black.
trans-unit.target: 为了保持一致性，以下值已被采用从 LOGFONT: 0 = DontCare，100 = 细，200 = ExtraLight 或 UltraLight，300 = 浅，400 = 普通或 Regular，500 = 中等; 600 = SemiBold 或 DemiBold，700 = 加粗，800 = ExtraBold 或 UltraBold 和 900 = 粗或黑色。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值属于类型<xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The default value is `zero`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `zero`。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the [ForegroundColor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/colors_9xiq.asp) ([COLORREF](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/colors_9xiq.asp)) attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 标识[ForegroundColor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/colors_9xiq.asp) ([COLORREF](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/colors_9xiq.asp)) 的文本范围的属性。

trans-unit.source: Foreground color is equivalent to the text or font color.
trans-unit.target: 前景色相当于文本或字体颜色。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.HorizontalTextAlignment"></xref> attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.HorizontalTextAlignment"></xref>文本范围的属性。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal text alignment applied to the paragraph(s) associated with the calling text range.
trans-unit.target: 应用于与调用文本范围关联的段落水平文本对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.target: 此属性的值属于类型<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.HorizontalTextAlignment>默认值是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.HorizontalTextAlignment></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.HorizontalTextAlignment></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.HorizontalTextAlignment>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the `IndentationFirstLine` (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph.TextIndent*>) attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 标识`IndentationFirstLine`(<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph.TextIndent*>) 的文本范围的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph.TextIndent*>

trans-unit.source: The first-line indentation (specified as a <xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit> unit type value) applied to the paragraph(s) associated with the calling text range.
trans-unit.target: 首行缩进 (指定为<xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>单位类型值) 应用于与调用文本范围关联的段落。</xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the `IsReadOnly` attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 标识`IsReadOnly`文本范围的属性。

trans-unit.source: The read-only state of the document associated with the calling text range.
trans-unit.target: 与调用文本范围关联的文档只读状态。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a document or file is read-only, but you can still edit it and save it as another file, the text is not considered read-only.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 文档或文件是只读的但仍可以对其进行编辑，并将其保存为另一个文件，如果文本不被视为只读的。

trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the `IsSubscript` (<xref href="System.Windows.FontVariants"></xref>) attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 标识`IsSubscript`(<xref href="System.Windows.FontVariants"></xref>) 的文本范围的属性。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值属于类型<xref:System.Boolean>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the `MarginBottom` (<xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref>) attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 标识`MarginBottom`(<xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref>) 的文本范围的属性。

trans-unit.source: The bottom margin applied to the page(s) associated with the calling text range.
trans-unit.target: 下边距应用于与调用文本范围关联的页。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `zero`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `zero`。

trans-unit.source: The trailing margin applied to the page(s) associated with the calling text range.
trans-unit.target: 应用于的页的尾随边距与调用文本范围关联。

trans-unit.source: Identifies whether the value of a given attribute varies over a text range in a rich edit control.
trans-unit.target: 标识是否在 rich edit 控件中的文本范围内的给定属性的值发生变化。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetAttributeValue%2A> returns `TextPattern.MixedAttributeValue` to indicate this variation instead of a collection of attribute values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetAttributeValue%2A>返回`TextPattern.MixedAttributeValue`以指示此变体中而不是属性值的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetAttributeValue%2A>

trans-unit.target: 制表位的集合具有指定为每个制表位<xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>单位类型值。</xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>

trans-unit.target: 标识`TextFlowDirections`(<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections"></xref>) 的文本范围的属性。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值属于类型<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections>

trans-unit.source: The default value is the bitwise combination of the following values: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections> `|` <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections> `|` <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是以下值的按位组合︰ <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections> `|` <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections> `|` <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the event raised whenever the text selection is modified.
trans-unit.target: 标识每当修改文本选择时引发的事件。

trans-unit.source: Some text controls handle the text insertion point (cursor) as a zero-width text selection and might raise `TextSelectionChangedEvent` when the cursor is moved.
trans-unit.target: 某些文本控件处理为零宽度文本选择的文本插入点 （光标） 和可能引发`TextSelectionChangedEvent`当移动光标。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To follow cursor movements, UI Automation clients are advised to keep track of insertion point changes by listening for corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element events rather than depending on <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.TextSelectionChangedEvent>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 为了跟随光标移动，UI 自动化客户端建议跟踪通过侦听对应的插入点变更[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素事件，而不是依赖于<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.TextSelectionChangedEvent>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.TextSelectionChangedEvent>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] providers.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用此标识符[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: 客户端应用程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
